issue.title: How to Save/Add payment method
issue.body:
I want to save/add the payment method for my subscriptions, so that payment will be automatically done with the reference number or payment method. However, I am unable to find any helpful documents. Please help me out. How to implement this.
Thank You

issue.title: Diners club credit card not accepted
issue.body:
I have been trying to use my diners club credit card for many months now, but every time it shows that "This card network is not supported". 

I checked various pages, documentation and others ([1](https://razorpay.com/docs/payments/payment-methods/cards/), [2](https://razorpay.com/pricing/), [3](https://razorpay.com/payment-gateway/)) and it is mentioned that Diners is accepted. But still I'm unable to use my card with Razorpay even though it works perfectly with other payment gateways.

Can someone please look into this issue and rectify it?

issue.title: Payment Link API issue occur
Error In Wordpress if more then one plugin use Razor pay composer
issue.body:
### Steps to reproduce the behavior

In a WordPress setup, when multiple plugins utilize the Razor Pay Composer package, an error arises due to the existence of a duplicate class.

### Expected behavior

If there is a conflict between two plugins, it will not impact the site.

### Actual behavior

Unable to access the site due to critical error.


### Code snippets

_No response_

### Php version

PHP V7.4

### Library version

razor-pay 2.8.7

### Additional Information

_No response_
